sentences: John Kenneth Dust (born John Kenneth Dunkin: November 30, 1972), better known by the stage name Pigeon John, is an American rapper based in Los Angeles, California.
Pigeon John claims that his stage name was provided by Jesus who was driving around Inglewood: "He hopped out and handed me a dead pigeon.
He whispered, 'Please have a good time, you're really bumming me out.'
In the early 1990s, Pigeon John and his childhood friend B-Twice formed the hip-hop duo Brainwash Projects.
Between 1997 and 2000, Pigeon John recorded the songs that became his first solo album, Is Clueless.
Pigeon John then signed to Basement Records and released Is Dating Your Sister (2003) and Pigeon John Sings the Blues (2005).
In 2005, Lyrics Born saw Pigeon John on the Cali Comm Tour and brought him into Quannum Projects.
That same year, Pigeon John's single "Deception" was featured on a series of Nestle Crunch commercials.
In 2006, after signing to Quannum, Pigeon John released his fourth solo album, And the Summertime Pool Party.
In 2014, he released an album titled Encino Man.
In 2019, he released "They Don't Make Em Like Me" as a single.
On April 24, 2020, he released his eighth studio album: Gotta Good Feelin'.
John was married to Harmony Dust from 2002 to 2010.
